SELECT SEQ, auth.AUTH_NAME, auth.PAGE, auth.ORGNZT_ID, org.ORGNZT_NM, auth.GROUP_ID, auth.ACCEPT_LINK, auth.BAN_LINK, auth.AUTH_PRIORITY, auth.USE_YN, auth.INS_ID, DATE_FORMAT(INS_DT,'%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%s') AS INS_DT, auth.UPT_ID, DATE_FORMAT(UPT_DT,'%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%s') AS UPT_DT FROM AUTHMANAGE auth LEFT JOIN (SELECT ORGNZT_ID, ORGNZT_NM FROM COMTNORGNZTINFO) AS org ON auth.ORGNZT_ID = org.ORGNZT_ID WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND auth.PAGE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{page}, '%')
AND auth.AUTH_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{authNm}, '%')
AND auth.ORGNZT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orgnztId}, '%')
AND org.ORGNZT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orgnztNm}, '%')
AND auth.GROUP_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{groupId}, '%')
AND auth.ACCEPT_LINK LIKE CONCAT('%', #{acceptLink}, '%')
AND auth.BAN_LINK LIKE CONCAT('%', #{banLink}, '%')
AND auth.USE_YN = #{useYn}
ORDER BY auth.SEQ ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AUTHMANAGE (AUTH_NAME, PAGE, ORGNZT_ID, GROUP_ID, ACCEPT_LINK, BAN_LINK, AUTH_PRIORITY, USE_YN, INS_ID, INS_DT) VALUES (#{authNm}, #{page}, #{orgnztId}, #{groupId}, #{acceptLink}, #{banLink}, #{authPriority}, #{useYn}, #{insId}, SYSDATE())
mapper.update: UPDATE AUTHMANAGE SET AUTH_NAME = #{authNm}, PAGE = #{page}, ORGNZT_ID = #{orgnztId}, GROUP_ID = #{groupId}, ACCEPT_LINK = #{acceptLink}, BAN_LINK = #{banLink}, AUTH_PRIORITY = #{authPriority}, USE_YN = #{useYn}, UPT_ID = #{uptId}, UPT_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
